name: incedo-backend-challenge
description: This Node.js application allows you to search for artists by name and export the results to a CSV file. If no results are found, it retrieves random artist names from a JSON dictionary source file.

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-ts
scripts.watch: npx concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-node"
